entityIdentity.title: Entity Identity
entityIdentity.description: Describes the entity involved in schema subject.

entityWarehouse.title: Entity: Warehouse
entityWarehouse.description: Describes the identity of the warehouse.

currencyType.title: Currency Type
currencyType.description: The type of currency this warehouse uses.

currencyCode.title: Currency Code
currencyCode.description: A unit of money or exchange.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit each price is set to.

unitType.title: Unit Type
unitType.description: The quantity things are measured in.

warehouseTariffDate.title: Warehouse Tariff Date
warehouseTariffDate.description: The begin and end date for a warehouse tariff.

beginDate.title: Tariff Begin Date
beginDate.description: The effective date of the warehouse tariff.

endDate.title: Tariff End Date
endDate.description: The day before the effective date of the new year.

warehouseReceiving.title: Warehouse Receiving
warehouseReceiving.description: Defines receiving cotton in a warehouse.

receivingRate.title: Receiving
receivingRate.description: Cost of receiving, issuing of warehouse receipt, and placing in storage, per bale.

receivingCertRate.title: Certificated Receiving
receivingCertRate.description: Cost of receiving, issuing of warehouse receipt, and placing in storage for certificated cotton, per bale.

warehouseStorage.title: Warehouse Storage
warehouseStorage.description: Defines storing cotton in a warehouse.

storageRate.title: Storage
storageRate.description: Cost of storing cotton in warehouse, per bale per unit time (day or month).

storageCertRate.title: Certificated Storage
storageCertRate.description: Cost of storage for certificated cotton, per bale per unit time (day or month).

storageInsuranceRate.title: Storage Insurance
storageInsuranceRate.description: Additional charge for insurance while in storage, per bale per unit time (day or month).

warehouseLoading.title: Warehouse Loading
warehouseLoading.description: Defines loading cotton at a warehouse.

loadingRate.title: Loading
loadingRate.description: Cost of picking out by tag number, removing cotton from storage, delivering to warehouse platform, and loading, per bale.

warehouseCompression.title: Warehouse Compression
warehouseCompression.description: Defines compression of cotton in a warehouse.

compressionRate.title: Compression
compressionRate.description: Cost of compression of cotton at a warehouse, per bale.

compressionPatchRate.title: Application of Patch
compressionPatchRate.description: Cost of application of patch where necessary, per bale.

compressionExtraRate.title: Extra Compression
compressionExtraRate.description: Cost of extra compression for bales weighing over the weight limit, per bale.

markingRate.title: Marking
markingRate.description: Cost to apply mark or brand to cotton, per bale.

warehouseClassing.title: Warehouse Classing
warehouseClassing.description: Defines classing and sampling cotton at a warehouse.

samplingShipmentRate.title: Sampling at Shipment
samplingShipmentRate.description: Cost of sampling or resampling at time of shipment, per bale.

samplingStorageRate.title: Sampling from Storage
samplingStorageRate.description: Cost of sampling or resampling, Including removing cotton from and returning it to storage, per bale.

samplingOneSideRate.title: Sampling from One Side
samplingOneSideRate.description: Cost of sampling from one side only, per bale.

classingCertRate.title: Certificated Classing
classingCertRate.description: Cost of classing for certificated cotton, per bale.

warehouseWeighing.title: Warehouse Weighing
warehouseWeighing.description: Defines weighing cotton in a warehouse.

weighingShipmentRate.title: Weighing at Shipment
weighingShipmentRate.description: Cost of weighing or reweighing at time of shipment including furnishing original and copies of certified weight sheets, per bale.

weighingStorageRate.title: Weighing from Storage
weighingStorageRate.description: Cost of weighing or reweighing, including removing cotton from and returning it to storage and furnishing original and copies of certified weight sheets, per bale.

weighingAndSamplingRate.title: Weighing and Sampling
weighingAndSamplingRate.description: Cost of weighing or reweighing at time of sampling from storage, including removing cotton from and returning it to storage and furnishing original and copies of certified weight sheets, per bale.

receivingAdditionalFee.title: Additional Receiving Fee
receivingAdditionalFee.description: Cost of any fees added while receiving order, such as any classing or program fees, per bale.

receivingBlockRate.title: Receiving Block Storage
receivingBlockRate.description: Cost of receiving block storage, per bale.

storageBlockRate.title: Block Storage
storageBlockRate.description: Cost of block storage, per bale per unit time (day or month).

loadingBlockRate.title: Loading Block Storage
loadingBlockRate.description: Cost of loading out of block storage, per bale.

markingExtraRate.title: Extra Marking
markingExtraRate.description: Cost of additional marking or branding in excess of character limit, per bale.

samplingExtraRate.title: Additional Sampling
samplingExtraRate.description: Cost of drawing an extra set of samples, at time of any sampling, per bale.

samplingSortingRate.title: Special Sorting of Samples
samplingSortingRate.description: Cost of special sorting of samples, per sample.

samplingDeliveryRate.title: Delivery of Samples
samplingDeliveryRate.description: Cost of delivery of samples or types by postage, freight or express carrier, actual cost.

samplingSackRate.title: Sample Sacks
samplingSackRate.description: Cost of furnishing sacks for samples, per sack.

samplingHolesRate.title: Closing Sample Holes
samplingHolesRate.description: Cost of closing holes on samples, per bale.

weighingSheetsRate.title: Weight Sheets
weighingSheetsRate.description: Cost of providing extra copies of weight sheets, per bale.

typingUnderRate.title: Typing Under Weight
typingUnderRate.description: Cost of typing - 25 pounds and under, per bale.

typingOverRate.title: Typing Over Weight
typingOverRate.description: Cost of typing - over 25 pounds, per bale.

reconditioningBrushingRate.title: Brushing Cotton
reconditioningBrushingRate.description: Cost of brushing and/or blowing dirt and/or sand off cotton, per bale.

reconditioningDryingRate.title: Drying Wet Cotton
reconditioningDryingRate.description: Cost of drying cotton received wet but undamaged, per bale.

reconditioningDamagedRate.title: Damaged Cotton
reconditioningDamagedRate.description: Cost of repairing plated, water packed or gin fall bales or picking damaged cotton, per bale.

reconditioningBailingRate.title: Bailing
reconditioningBailingRate.description: Cost of bailing loose, pickings or sweepings, per bale.

reconditioningFumigationRate.title: Fumigation
reconditioningFumigationRate.description: Cost of removal from platform, non-vacuum fumigation, and the immediate return to warehouse platform, per bale.

phytosanitaryRate.title: Phytosanitary Certificate
phytosanitaryRate.description: Cost of Phytosanitary Certificates of cotton for export, per load.

handlingTransitRate.title: Handling Transit Cotton
handlingTransitRate.description: Cost of handling transit cotton, per bale.

loadingExpeditedRate.title: Expedited Loading
loadingExpeditedRate.description: Cost of expedited loading of order, per bale.

loadingFlatbedRate.title: Flatbed Loading
loadingFlatbedRate.description: Cost of loading outbound flatbed trucks, per bale.

unloadingRate.title: Unloading
unloadingRate.description: Cost of unloading and restocking of cotton, per bale.

rehandlingRate.title: Rehandling
rehandlingRate.description: Cost of rehandling after breakout because of delayed pickup, cancellation of order, or for any other purpose, per bale.

rearrangingRate.title: Rearranging
rearrangingRate.description: Cost of rearranging or reworking of cotton on or in truck for any purpose, per bale.

consolidationRate.title: Consolidation
consolidationRate.description: Cost of consolidation including unloading, checking and reloading to outbound conveyance, per bale.

surchargeFee.title: Surcharge
surchargeFee.description: Cost of surcharge on orders containing 10 bales or less, per bale.

matchingTagsRate.title: Matching Tags
matchingTagsRate.description: Cost of matching special tags to bales by bale number, per bale.

shippingTagsRate.title: Shipper's Tags
shippingTagsRate.description: Cost of applying shipper's tags, per bale.

shippingExtraTiesRate.title: Extra Ties
shippingExtraTiesRate.description: Cost of extra ties if ties on bales are not reusable and extra ties are necessary, per bale.

shippingBoltSealRate.title: Bolt Seal
shippingBoltSealRate.description: Cost of applying bolt seal, per load.

shippingDrayageRate.title: Drayage
shippingDrayageRate.description: Cost of drayage, where necessary, to rail, per bale.

shippingOnHoldRate.title: On-Hold
shippingOnHoldRate.description: Cost of on-hold option, per bale.

shippingEarlyOrderRate.title: Early Shipping Order
shippingEarlyOrderRate.description: Cost of additional fee for early shipping orders, per bale.

shippingChangeOrderRate.title: Change of Shipping Order
shippingChangeOrderRate.description: Cost of any change to an order following receipt of shipping order, per bale.

shippingConversionOrderRate.title: Conversion of Shipping Order
shippingConversionOrderRate.description: Cost of conversion of early shipping order to complete shipping order, per order.

shippingSwappingOrderRate.title: Swapping of Shipping Order
shippingSwappingOrderRate.description: Cost of swapping of shipping order per bale on any shipping order swapped, per bale.

shippingResaleOrderRate.title: Resale of Shipping Order
shippingResaleOrderRate.description: Cost of resale of shipping order per side, with retention of agreed upon load date, per bale.

shippingDelayedPickUpRate.title: Delayed Pick-Up
shippingDelayedPickUpRate.description: Cost of cotton that is picked up after the scheduled pick-up date, per bale.

shippingCancellationRate.title: Cancellation of Order
shippingCancellationRate.description: Cost of cancellation of order and return to stock after breakout, per bale.

receiptConversionRate.title: Receipt Conversion
receiptConversionRate.description: Cost of converting electronic receipts to paper receipts or paper receipts to electronic receipts, per receipt.

rangingInspectionRate.title: Ranging for Inspection
rangingInspectionRate.description: Cost of ranging cotton for inspection and return to storage if necessary, per bale.

rateAmount.title: Rate Amount
rateAmount.description: The monetary amount of each rate per unit
